Nighlight/windlord:

Nighlight was deep sleeping, her face was camly but her expression 
was other... as if she was other person.

Windlord when he heard his commander came in said "As you see, 
camly... the trouble will be when she wakes up..."windlord shook his 
head and added"Perhaps we should hold her in stasis until that thing 
leave her alone... Or Kup may help if his delicate "thing" has 
ended... but we have to decide soon, If I calcule right, she will 
wake up soon."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus was about to leave and go see Nightlight when he could feel 
the small vibrations that were coming from the training room.
> 
> Rodimus: Computer, identify the disturbance.
> 
> Comp: Vibrations iminating from the training facility.
> 
> Rodimus: On screen.
> 
> The main biewer in the briefing room flicked on showing Megatron in 
the training room. Seeing that everything was alright, Rodimus just 
chuckles, and leaves.
> 
> Just a few moments later and Rodimus walks into the med bay.
> 
> Rodimus: Windlord, how is Nightlight?
> 
> 
> robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> Megatron graciously bowed, then turned and left.  He wandered 
around the base, noting restricted areas.  He found a training area, 
and went inside.  He inspected the training equipment, then found 
something interesting.  A seies of deflector shields, used for 
training against deflected shots.  He set up a series of deflectors 
to dissapate energy, and stepped back.  He dropped his sword and his 
shield, then powered up his fusion cannon.  He fired a shot at 5% 
power.  It made some noise, but not something to draw attention to.  
The energy dissapated quickly, and the clone kicked the energy up to 
10%.  He fied again, this time with a little more noise, and a little 
longer wait for the energy to dissapate.  Eventually, he goit up to 
45%, and when he fired again, the entire room was quaking and 
shaking, Megatron actually had trouble holding his ground.
> 
> Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> 
> Kup returns to the briefing room.
> 
> Rodimus: How did it go, old friend?
> 
> Kup: I'll never like seeing a femmebot cry. She went with Organics 
to the mess hall.
> 
> Rodimus: Would you mind showing Fortuneteller to a free quarters.
> 
> Kup: Sure thing, Roddy.
> 
> Kup gestures towards the door, allowing Fortuneteller to leave 
first...
> 
> Rodimus returns his attention to Megatron.
> 
> Rodimus: Well if there is nothing else to discuss at this time then 
I'll have quarters set up for you as well. The secure areas of the 
base will be off limits of course. They are all marked. You may feel 
free to walk the base however. The mess hall, holodecks, training 
room and any other recreational activities are at your disposal. Some 
Maximal hospitality.
> 
> 
> Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Fortuneteller: Since this conversation no longer seems
> to concern me, perhaps someone could show me to my
> quarters?  I assume I'll be staying here a while.
> 
> --- Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> > : : Kup : :
> > 
> > Kup looked up, his optics now focusing on the femme.
> > He saw the pain she was going through and watching
> > it hurt him.
> > 
> > He walks closer to her, resting his left hand on her
> > right shoulder.
> > 
> > Kup: Only he knows why he did what he did. I'm so
> > sorry for your loss...
> > 
> > At this point he was really at a loss for words.
> > 
> > 
> > Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@y...>
> > wrote:
> > Wolfblade:
> > 
> > Th femme sat absolutely still for a moment.  She was
> > wanting to 
> > distance herself from that bot, but now her spark
> > ached for his 
> > presense.  She tried to remain calm and collected,
> > but she finally 
> > broke down.  She dropped he tools, and sobbed into
> > her hands.
> > "Why... why did he go?  Why did he go with them?"
> > she questioned 
> > outloud.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
> > <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> > > 
> > > Rodimus: She should be told, but perhaps by
> > someone with a more 
> > softer edge. Kup, would you please tell her?
> > > 
> > > Kup: You have to give me the heartwrenching jobs
> > dont ya,' lad. 
> > I'll take care of it though.
> > > 
> > > Kup heads to the science lab, walking in not long
> > after Wolfblade.
> > > 
> > > Kup: Hello. There was more to tell you but I
> > figure it would be 
> > better in private rather then up in that briefing
> > room. I could tell 
> > that you care for Malice. I'm sorry to tell you
> > this, lass, but 
> > Malice was captured. He is now one of Unicron's
> > Minions.
> > > 
> > > Kup looks down, his optics closeing with emotion.
> > He couldn't look 
> > her streight in the optics. He had never liked
> > telling bots bad news 
> > about their loved ones.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > Wolfblade/ Megatron Revived:
> > > 
> > > Wolfblade sighed heavy again.
> > > "Where did he go?" she asked as she walked away. 
> > She returned to 
> > the 
> > > lab and sat down on the bench.  Someone wasn't
> > talking.  And who 
> > > exactly was that big white bot?  Things didn't
> > seem right to her, 
> > but 
> > > nonetheless, she continued working on the project.
> > > 
> > > Megatron watched the femme carefully, noted her
> > body language, how 
> > > she presented herself.  She seemed to like Malice,
> > like him a lot.  
> > > SHe tried to look annoyed, but he saw through her
> > ruse.
> > > "Should I tell her?  Should I tell her Malice was
> > taken prisoner 
> > and 
> > > is now a loyal minion?"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
> > <roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > 
> > > > Rodimus: I'm afraid I do not know the wherabouts
> > of Malice. As 
> > for 
> > > your plan, its interesting. A good idea. I should
> > note that the 
> > > possible instability of such a thing does worry me
> > a bit, but in 
> > > these times risks must be taken.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > > Wolfblade:
> > > >  
> > > > "Oh!  Yes sir!  Malice and I decided that it
> > might be a good idea 
> > > to have a back plan to the cannon already in
> > construction.  We plan 
> > > to use a high mass object and collapse it's
> > gravity, turning it 
> > into 
> > > a black hole.  We wanted to launch it in an area
> > of spatial 
> > > instability.  Once the black hole had served it's
> > purpose, we 
> > planned 
> > > to open a time rift and send it through.  The rift
> > should 
> > neutralize 
> > > the intense gravity, expanding it to original
> > size.  In theory 
> > > anyway."
> > > > The femme beamed at her explainatio, then a
> > thought occured to 
> > her.
> > > > "Where is Malice anyways?  He went to do
> > something, he said he'd 
> > > come back.  hat was mega cycles ago!  Where did he
> > go?" she asked, 
> > > masking her concern with annoyance.
> > > > 
> > > > Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > 
> > > > Rodimus: Thank you for reporting, Wolfblade. We
> > were just curious 
> > > as to what you have going on in the science lab.
> > Could we possibly 
> > > have a report on your activities?
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@y...>
> > wrote:
> > > > Wolfblade:
> > > > 
> > > > Wolfblade was busy in the lab when Kup's call
> > came through.  She 
> > > > sighed heavily and got up.  She walked around
> > their little 
> > science 
> > > > project and made her to the conferance room. 
> > Inside was Kup and 
> > > > Rodimus, and a big white and black bot she had
> > never seen 
> > before.  
> > > > She looked warily at him, but turned to Kup and
> > Rodimus.
> > > > "Wolfblade reporting, per your orders."
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
> > <roborick007@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus: That's Wolfblade. I dont know if she
> > is still in the 
> > > base. 
> > > > Kup?
> > > > > Kup shrugs.
> > > > >  
> > > > > Kup: With everything that has been happening
> > lately I lost 
> > track 
> > > of 
> > > > who has been coming and going.
> > > > >  
> > > > > Kup hits a comm switch.
> > > > >  
> > > > > Kup: Wolfblade, this is Security Chief Kup. If
> > you are still in 
> > > the 
> > > > Maximal base, please report to the conference
> > room per orders of 
> > > > Commander Rodimus Prime.
> > > > > 
> > > > > robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > > > OOC:  Three or four I think.  KitKat,
> > Camoflage, Elita.  I 
> > don't 
> > > > know about the rest.  The femme with Malice in
> > the security tapes 
> > > is 
> > > > Wolfblade, a femme from another dimention. 
> > She's a wolf if the 
> >
